questions.question: Pain intensity on scale of 0-5?
options: 0. I have no pain at the moment.
1. The pain is very mild at the moment.
2. The pain comes and goes and is moderate.
3. The pain is fairly severe at the moment.
4. The pain is very severe at the moment.
5. The pain is the worst imaginable at the moment.

questions.id: Does pain limit ability to do daily activities
questions.question: Does your condition limit your ability to work or carry out your normal daily activities?
